div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Mar. 13, 1920. JOSEPH SPIKA WILL REJOICE

body.p: When Joseph Spika, one of our Siberian legionnaires, who at the present time is lying in the County Hospital waiting to undergo an operation, returns to his home in Czechoslovakia he will gratefully remember compatriots in Chicago. In answer to our call, he is being remembered by many of our countrymen. Donations received by our office are being deposited not as alms but as a token of esteem, a proof of love and admiration.....Yesterday, the following donations were deposited in our office: [Translator's note: List of names and addresses of donors follow.] Total $19.45.
